summary:
Melt down Ancient swords, axes,bows and arrows to Daedraheart
You must have one or more Ancient weapon/ammo in inventory for the recipe to appear in the melting-menu at the Smelter. Due to have the Menu as clean as possible.
Now You have another reason to enter dungeons to collect ancient weapons and ammo.
descriptionHtml:
Melt down Ancient swords, axes,bows and arrows to Daedraheart
You must have one or more Ancient weapon/ammo in inventory for the recipe to appear in the melting-menu at the Smelter. Due to have the Menu as clean as possible.
Now You have another reason to enter dungeons to collect ancient weapons and ammo.
author: KennyBall
